Text: Update Notification vpst IMAGE Dear Friend IMAGE The latest version of little ol me is now available FREE With my new version I have improved my personality so I dont interrupt you when you are hard at work Plus I can now deliver breaking news right to your desktop keeping you informed and up to date You can select the type of news you would like me to deliver ie sports world news music etc and I will bring it to you New Features News Alerts receive breaking news right to your desktop Personality Upgrade fewer interruptions while you are at work What people have to say With BonziBUDDY I have been tuned in all day catching whats happening around the world I cant believe I ever had a computer without him IMAGE Download or Update BonziBUDDY Now FREE System Requirements MB of RAM MB of Free Disk Space Windows x NT ME Win XP Sound Card Microsoft IE Internet Explorer or above Copyright BONZICOM Software All Rights Reserved BONZICOM and BONZI are trademarks of BONZICOM Software All Rights Reserved IMAGE Please do NOT reply to this email This is an automated message For support related issues please go to supporthtm This is an automated update notification per your request You downloaded one of our products or entered your EMail address on at the BONZICOM site indicating a preference to receive product news updates and special offers from BONZICOM Software To remove your name from future EMail communications simply visit the following URL and click on the Remove button http wwwbonzicomsupportunsubscribeaspemail NRONCOM Or please send an EMail to
